content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for expressing interest in my apartment, Maryam. However, due to our differing negotiation styles, let me start the discussion with a higher price than what you may have initially expected. I'm looking for at least 1200 Euros per month for this exquisite living space. If you find this acceptable, I agree to the price of 1200 Euro! If not, please let me know why you don't want to continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. 1200 Euros is quite expensive for me. I am a student and I am looking for a more affordable option. Would you be willing to lower the price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my primary goal is to obtain the highest rental price possible, considering my approach as a landlord. However, I appreciate your interest and wish you the best of luck in finding a suitable accommodation within your budget. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
